scripts.dev: npm run setup-consul ; npx nodemon --watch src src/server/index.js
scripts.test: npm run clean ; npm run setup-consul ; npx nyc mocha --recursive -R mocha-junit-reporter
scripts.rest-doc: mkdir -p wiki/rest-doc ; npx raml2md -o file-per-resource -p wiki/rest-doc --output-ext=.endpoint.md rest-doc/main.raml
scripts.domain-doc: mkdir -p wiki/domain-doc ; npx sq2md -o file-per-src -p wiki/domain-doc --init=init --field-bl=createdAt,updatedAt --output-ext=.model.md src/server/db/models
scripts.api-doc: mkdir -p wiki/api-doc ; npx jsdoc2md -f $(find src/server) > wiki/api-doc/Home.md
scripts.doc: npm run rest-doc ; npm run domain-doc ; npm run api-doc
